mapper.select: -- -- Latitude 위도, Longitude 경도,위도 (37.5533535 127.0235435) SELECT storeIdx, storeImage, storeName, (CASE storeBrand WHEN 0 then '미 설정' WHEN 1 then '골프존' WHEN 2 then '골프존파크' WHEN 3 then '레드골프' WHEN 4 then '시티존' WHEN 5 then '오케이온' WHEN 6 then '프렌즈스크린T' WHEN 7 then '프렌즈스크린G' WHEN 8 then 'SG골프' END) AS storeBrand, storeLocation, round((6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{userLatitude})) * cos(radians(storeLatitude)) * cos(radians(storeLongitude) - radians(#{userLongitude})) + sin(radians(#{userLatitude})) * sin(radians(storeLatitude)))), 1) as distanceFromUser FROM Stores WHERE storeName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%');

SELECT storeImage, (CASE storeBrand WHEN 0 then '미 설정' WHEN 1 then '골프존' WHEN 2 then '골프존파크' WHEN 3 then '레드골프' WHEN 4 then '시티존' WHEN 5 then '오케이온' WHEN 6 then '프렌즈스크린T' WHEN 7 then '프렌즈스크린G' WHEN 8 then 'SG골프' END) AS storeBrand, storeName, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(reviewScore) / COUNT(reviewIdx), 1), 0) FROM Reviews WHERE Reviews.storeIdx = Stores.storeIdx) AS reviewStar, storePhoneNumber, (SELECT Count(reviewIdx) FROM Reviews) AS reviewCount, storeLocation, storeTime
FROM Stores WHERE storeIdx = #{storeIdx}

SELECT storeIdx,storeImage, (CASE storeBrand WHEN 0 then '미 설정' WHEN 1 then '골프존' WHEN 2 then '골프존파크' WHEN 3 then '레드골프' WHEN 4 then '시티존' WHEN 5 then '오케이온' WHEN 6 then '프렌즈스크린T' WHEN 7 then '프렌즈스크린G' WHEN 8 then 'SG골프' END) AS storeBrand, storeName, storeLatitude, storeLongitude, round((6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{userLatitude})) * cos(radians(storeLatitude)) * cos(radians(storeLongitude) - radians(#{userLongitude})) + sin(radians(#{userLatitude})) * sin(radians(storeLatitude)))), 1) as distanceFromUser, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(reviewScore) / COUNT(reviewIdx), 1), 0) FROM Reviews WHERE Reviews.storeIdx = Stores.storeIdx) AS reviewStar
FROM Stores ORDER BY CASE WHEN @orderRule = 1 THEN distanceFromUser END ASC, CASE WHEN @orderRule = 2 THEN reviewStar END DESC;

SELECT storeImage, (CASE storeBrand WHEN 0 then '미 설정' WHEN 1 then '골프존' WHEN 2 then '골프존파크' WHEN 3 then '레드골프' WHEN 4 then '시티존' WHEN 5 then '오케이온' WHEN 6 then '프렌즈스크린T' WHEN 7 then '프렌즈스크린G' WHEN 8 then 'SG골프' END) AS storeBrand, storeName, storeLatitude, storeLongitude, round((6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{userLatitude})) * cos(radians(storeLatitude)) * cos(radians(storeLongitude) - radians(#{userLongitude})) + sin(radians(#{userLatitude})) * sin(radians(storeLatitude)))), 1) as distanceFromUser, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(reviewScore) / COUNT(reviewIdx), 1), 0) FROM Reviews WHERE Reviews.storeIdx = Stores.storeIdx) AS reviewStar
FROM Stores WHERE storeBrand IN (#{brand}) AND lefthandStaus = #{lefthandStatus} AND parkingStatus = #{parkingStatus} AND groupseatStatus = #{groupseatStatus} AND floorscreenStatus = #{floorscreenStatus} AND storageStatus = #{storageStatus} AND lessonStatus = #{lessonStatus} HAVING distanceFromUser < #{distance} ORDER BY CASE WHEN @orderRule = 1 THEN distanceFromUser END ASC, CASE WHEN @orderRule = 2 THEN reviewStar END DESC;
